title: Process a Manual Gate Entry
description: The gate's OCR camera system fails. The clerk must process a truck's entry manually.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the system failure and switch to manual processing mode.
tasks.expected_outcome: Clerk is aware of the failure and prepared to handle manual entry.

tasks.description: Ask the driver for the container number and truck license plate and manually enter them into the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The clerk accurately types the required information into the gate system.

tasks.description: Perform all standard checks (appointment, customs) and issue the ticket.
tasks.expected_outcome: Despite the system failure, the truck is processed correctly and allowed to enter.
